bibl.title: Egyptian Royal Sculptures of the Ptolemaic Period.
bibl.note: Diss. New York Univ. Summary in DA 60 (1999-2000) p. 2715-A. - Analyzes 150 Egyptian-style statues of the Greek Ptolemaic rulers of Egypt from Ptolemy I through Cleopatra VII (305-30 B.C.).
STANWICK Paul Edmund, Egyptian Royal Sculptures of the Ptolemaic Period.
